name: Chessscape!
description:
Old style shoot'em up.

W A S D to move, mouse to target and fire.

This game has been created for didactic purposes by Valerio Bamberga.

Last modifications:

- New graphics

- New levels

- New enemies (with pathfinding)

- new bosses system

- New music

- New particle effects

- Powerups

- Permanent High score system

Enjoy!

Music Credits:

Deep And Dirty by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5045-deep-and-dirty

Special Spotlight by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4403-special-spotlight
